About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

I am a content developer at SudoCyber. I design hands-on labs that mirror threat actor playbooks and reproduce widely reported software flaws in a safe environment. I previously delivered penetration tests at Capgemini, supported security operations at Foresite and Wolfberry Cyber, and co-founded MVP Cluster to help startups build resilient products.

Foresite

I support security operations and vulnerability management, helping customers monitor threats and improve their security posture.

Wolfberry Cyber

Penetration Tester

I conduct network and web application penetration tests for small and medium businesses, identifying and reporting critical vulnerabilities.
